data.title: Iranian Cinema Pre Revolution and Post R
data.meta_description:
Iranian Cinema Pre Revolution and Post r - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Iranian cinema has a long history dating back to the early 20th century when the first films were made in Iran. 
2. Early Iranian films were primarily influenced by Iranian literature and mythology as well as seeking to emphasize ethics and humanity. 
3. The 1960s-70s were a significant time for Iranian cinema prior to the 1979 revolution, with increasing commercial film production focused on genres like melodrama and thrillers. Notable filmmakers emerged who helped establish alternative Iranian cinema.
